Q.13. WHAT KIND OF BUSINESS OR INDUSTRY DID YOU WORK IN JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  Q.14. WHAT WAS YOUR JOB IN THIS BUSINESS OR INDUSTRY* JUST WHAT DID YOU DO*     . PROFESSIONAL (DOCTORS, DENTISTS, LAWYERS, ACCOUNTANTS, ENGINEERS, TEACHERS, ETC.)    . SEMI-PROFESSIONALS (AVIATORS, COMMERCIAL ARTISTS DRAFTSMEN, PHOTOGRAPHERS, ENTERTAINERS, ETC.)    . SERVICE OCCUPATIONS (COOKS, WAITERS, BARBERS, GUARDS, POLICEMEN, ETC.)    . AGRICULTURE    . SKILLED OCCUPATIONS (TOOLMAKERS, CARPENTERS, PLUMBERS, PAINTERS, ETC.)    . SEMI-SKILLED OCCUPATIONS (MOST FACTORY, MACHINE OPERATORS, TRUCK DRIVERS)    . UNSKILLED OCCUPATIONS (LABORERS, INCLUDING FACTORY WORKERS WHOSE JOB IS NOT SPECIFIED)    . MANAGERS AND OFFICIALS (HIGHER TYPE WITH SUPERVISORY CAPACITY)    . MERCHANTS, SHOPKEEPERS, TRADESMEN, ETC. (OWN BUSINESS)    . CLERICAL    . SALES PERSONS (INCLUDING MANAGERS OF SMALL CHAIN STORES)    . MISCELLANEOUS UNCLASSIFIABLE (INCLUDES STUDENTS)    . NO ANSWER

Q.17. JUST WHAT KIND OF WORK ARE YOU DOING NOW* EXPLAIN FULLY WHAT YOUR REGULAR DUTIES ARE ON YOUR PRESENT JOB. X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION FOR QUESTIONS 15-17. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT YOUR JOB PLANS FOR AFTER THE WAR. WE WANT TO KNOW ABOUT THE FIRST JOB YOU PLAN TO TAKE AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY. IF YOU PLAN TO TAKE A VACATION FIRST, TELL WHAT YOU WILL DO AFTER THAT.

Q.18. WHAT KIND OF WORK DO YOU THINK YOU WILL DO RIGHT AFTER THE WAR* WRITE THE NAME OF THE JOB AND DESCRIBE IT AS FULLY AS YOU CAN. IF YOU ARE UNDECIDED, TELL WHAT YOU HAVE BEEN THINKING YOU MIGHT DO. X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP

Q.19. HAVE YOU EVER DONE ANY KIND OF WORK BEFORE LIKE WHAT YOU PLAN TO DO AFTER THE WAR*    1. YES, I DID THAT KIND OF WORK BEFORE I ENTERED THE ARMY   2. YES, I HAVE LEARNED THAT KIND OF WORK IN THE ARMY   3. NO, I HAVE NEVER DONE THAT KIND OF WORK YET   0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. HOW SURE DO YOU FEEL THAT AFTER THE WAR YOU WILL DO THE KIND OF WORK YOU DESCRIBED IN THE LAST QUESTION*    1. I,M ALMOST SURE I WILL   2. I PROBABLY WILL, BUT I MAY DO SOMETHING ELSE   3. I,M REALLY NOT AT ALL SURE WHAT I WILL DO   0. NO ANSWER

Q.21. DO YOU EXPECT TO WORK FOR YOURSELF OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE RIGHT AFTER YOU LEAVE THE ARMY*    1. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR MYSELF   2. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR THE GOVERNMENT (FEDERAL, STATE, CITY, ETC.)   3. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR A RELATIVE (FATHER, UNCLE, ETC.)   4. I EXPECT TO WORK FOR SOME OTHER EMPLOYER (COMPANY, PERSON, ETC.)   5. I PLAN TO GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL   6. I PLAN TO STAY IN THE ARMY   7. I DON,T HAVE ANY DEFINITE PLANS 8 0. NO ANSWER

Q.22. DO YOU THINK YOU ACTUALLY WILL GO BACK TO WORK FOR THE SAME EMPLOYER (COMPANY, PERSON, ETC.) YOU WORKED FOR BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*    1. YES, I,M QUITE SURE I WILL   2. I MAY, BUT I,M NOT SURE   3. NO, I DON,T THINK I WILL   4. I WORKED FOR MYSELF BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY   5. I WAS NOT WORKING BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY   0. NO ANSWER

Q.23. NO MATTER WHO YOU WORK FOR AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL BE DOING THE SAME TYPE OF WORK YOU ARE DOING NOW IN THE ARMY*    1. NO, I,LL GET INTO A DIFFERENT LINE OF WORK FROM WHAT I,M DOING NOW   2. I MIGHT STAY IN THE SAME LINE OF WORK, BUT PROBABLY WILL NOT   3. I MIGHT STAY IN THE SAME LINE OF WORK, AND PROBABLY WILL   4. YES, I,M ALMOST SURE I,LL STAY IN THE SAME LINE OF WORK I,M DOING NOW   0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. ARE THERE ANY CONDITIONS YOU CAN THINK OF UNDER WHICH YOU MIGHT CONSIDER STAYING IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR*    1. I WILL PROBABLY STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR   2. UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS I MIGHT CONSIDER STAYING IN THE ARMY   3. I WOULDN,T CONSIDER IT UNDER ANY CONDITION   0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. IF CIVILIAN JOBS ARE HARD TO GET AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY*    1. I WOULD WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY   2. I WOULD WANT TO GET OUT TO LOOK FOR A JOB, BUT I MIGHT WANT TO COME BACK TO THE ARMY   3. I WOULD RATHER TAKE ANY KIND OF JOB OUTSIDE THAN STAY IN THE ARMY   4. I,M SURE I WILL HAVE A JOB WAITING OUTSIDE THE ARMY   0. NO ANSWER

Q.26. HAVE YOU BEEN PLANNING TO TRY TO GET AN AVIATION JOB AFTER THE WAR, EITHER WITH AN AIRPLANE PLANT, AN AIRLINE COMPANY, OR WITH THE ARMY AIR FORCES*    1. NO, I HAVE PLANS FOR SOMETHING ELSE OUTSIDE OF AVIATION   2. NO, I HAVE NOT PLANNED MUCH OF ANYTHING AS YET FOR AFTER THE WAR   3. YES, I HAVE BEEN PLANNING TO GET AN AVIATION JOB AFTER THE WAR   0. NO ANSWER
Q.27. IF YOU DO HAVE SUCH PLANS FOR AN AVIATION JOB, WHICH WOULD YOU RATHER WORK FOR*    1. THE ARMY AIR FORCES (AS AN ENLISTED MAN)   2. AN AIRPLANE PLANT   3. AN AIRLINE COMPANY   0. NO ANSWER

NO, I WOULD NOT TAKE IT   2. I MIGHT TAKE IT, BUT PROBABLY WOULD NOT   3. I MIGHT TAKE IT, AND PROBABLY WOULD   4. YES, I WOULD TAKE IT   0. NO ANSWER

I MIGHT TAKE IT, BUT PROBABLY WOULD NOT   3. I MIGHT TAKE IT, AND PROBABLY WOULD   4. YES, I WOULD TAKE IT   0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. DO YOU THINK IT WOULD REALLY BE OF HELP TO YOU AFTER THE WAR TO TALK TO SOMEONE IN THE ARMY WHO COULD GIVE YOU EXPERT ADVICE AND INFORMATION ABOUT GOING BACK TO SCHOOL OR GETTING A CIVILIAN JOB*    1. IN MANY OUTFITS THERE IS A TIME EVERY WEEK WHEN THE MEN GET TOGETHER FOR AN "ORIENTATION" MEETING. AT THESE MEETINGS THERE ARE TALKS, MOVIES, OR DISCUSSIONS ON DIFFERENT SUBJECTS CONNECTED WITH THE WAR AND EACH MAN,S PART IN IT.
